ci_support_linux_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description: Stem is a Python controller library for Tor. With it you can use Tor's control protocol to script against the Tor process, or build things such as Nyx. Stem's latest version is 1.6.0 (released November 5th, 2017).
about.summary: Stem is a Python controller library that allows applications to interact with Tor (https://www.torproject.org/).

about.description: Stem is a Python controller library for Tor. With it you can use Tor's control protocol to script against the Tor process, or build things such as Nyx. Stem's latest version is 1.6.0 (released November 5th, 2017).
about.summary: Stem is a Python controller library that allows applications to interact with Tor (https://www.torproject.org/).

name: stem
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "stem" %}
{% set version = "1.8.0" %}
{% set file_ext = "tar.gz" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "a0b48ea6224e95f22aa34c0bc3415f0eb4667ddeae3dfb5e32a6920c185568c2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: '{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}'
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - stem

about:
  home: https://stem.torproject.org/
  license: GNU (LGPLv3)
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Stem is a Python controller library that allows applications to interact with Tor (https://www.torproject.org/).'
  description: "Stem is a Python controller library for Tor. With it you can use Tor's control protocol to script against the Tor process, or build things such as Nyx. Stem's latest version is 1.6.0 (released November 5th, 2017)."
  doc_url: https://stem.torproject.org/
  dev_url: https://gitweb.torproject.org/stem.git/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SekouD
